post:
![](https://www.yourlasthost.com/images/plesk_onyx.jpg)

We are **YourLastHost**, the only web host that guarantees to be the very last web host that you will ever need. We believes in constant innovation and iteration. So, what have you done for me lately? We’ve recently released 24/7 live chat support to facilitate instant resolution of common issues, and we’re in the process of rolling out phone support which allows you to speak directly with a technician.

**Windows Plesk Onyx Hosting Features:**

- Blazing Fast Windows SSD Storage
- ASP.NET 4.x, 3.5, 2.0 & Classic ASP
- ASP.NET Core 1.x & 2.x
- PHP 5.2.x - 7.x
- MVC 6 & 5, 4, 3, 2, 1
- Node.js Support
- MSSQL 2012, 2014, 2016 and 2017
- MySQL Databases
- Windows 2012 R2 / IIS 8
- Full Trust Hosting Level
- Dedicated Application Pool
- Pure SSD Storage
- Web Deploy, Visual Studio & Web Matrix Compatible
- 1-Click Plesk Application Vault
- Free Let's Encrypt SSL
- Plesk Onyx Control Panel
- Daily Website Backups
- 90 day money back guarantee (one of the longest in the industry!)
- Proactive service status checking
- 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
- 24/7 Support Live Chat and HelpDesk Support

**Here’s the offers:**

**1) Basic Plan**

- 2 GB SSD Storage
- 100 GB Monthly Bandwidth
- 1 Domain + 1 Sub domain
- Plesk Onyx Access
- Free Let's Encrypt SSLs
- Free Plesk Migrations
- $5/yr (Use Coupon Code: YLHWIN5YR)
- [ORDER NOW](https://clients.yourlasthost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=179)

**2) Advance Plan**

- 10 GB SSD Storage
- 500 GB Monthly Bandwidth
- 3 Domains + 3 Sub domains
- Plesk Onyx Access
- Free Let's Encrypt SSLs
- Free Plesk Migrations
- $15/yr (Use Coupon Code: YLHWIN15YR)
- [ORDER NOW](https://clients.yourlasthost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=180)

**Minimum Host Node Specifications:**

- 2x Intel Xeon E5-2660 CPU (16x 3 GHz)
- 64 GB RAM
- 2 x 2 TB SSDs
- Hardware RAID-10 Disks
- 100 Mbps to 1 Gbps Uplink

**Network Information:** 

- Los Angeles, California, USA
- Looking Glass: https://www.yourlasthost.com/datacenter-la-qn.php

Have thoughts about YourLastHost? Let us know! :)
